bitfields.name: BOOT_FAILURE_PIN
bitfields.description: GPIO port and pin number to use for indicating failure reason. The toggle rate of the pin is used to decode the error type. [2:0] - Defines GPIO port [7:3] - Defines GPIO pin

bitfields.name: SPI_RECOVERY_BOOT_EN
bitfields.description: SPI flash recovery boot is enabled, if non-zero value is written to this field.

registers.name: Reserved 0x00008
registers.description: This field is reserved for internal use

registers.name: DCFG_CC_SOCU_PIN
registers.description:
Device Configuration Credential Constraints for SoC specific Use Pinned. 
Combinations of PIN and DFLT bits and resulting restriction level: 
- PIN=1,DFLT=1: Restriction level 0. Access to the sub-domain is always enabled. This setting is provided for module use case scenario where DCFG_CC_SOCU_NS would be used to define further access restrictions before final deployment of the product. 
- PIN=0,DFLT=0: Restriction level 1. Access to the sub-domain is disabled at startup. But the access can be enabled through debug authentication process by providing appropriate Debug Credential (DC) certificate. 
- PIN=0,DFLT=1: Illegal setting. Part may lock-up if this setting is selected. 
- PIN=1,DFLT=0: Restriction level 3. Access to the sub-domain is permanently disabled and can't be reversed. This setting offers the highest level of restriction.

bitfields.name: UUID_CHECK
bitfields.description: Enforce UUID match during Debug authentication.

registers.name: DCFG_CC_SOCU_DFLT
registers.description:
Device Configuration Credential Constraints for SoC specific Use Debug Filter. 
Combinations of PIN and DFLT bits and resulting restriction level: 
- PIN=1,DFLT=1: Restriction level 0. Access to the sub-domain is always enabled. This setting is provided for module use case scenario where DCFG_CC_SOCU_NS would be used to define further access restrictions before final deployment of the product. 
- PIN=0,DFLT=0: Restriction level 1. Access to the sub-domain is disabled at startup. But the access can be enabled through debug authentication process by providing appropriate Debug Credential (DC) certificate. 
- PIN=0,DFLT=1: Illegal setting. Part may lock-up if this setting is selected. 
- PIN=1,DFLT=0: Restriction level 3. Access to the sub-domain is permanently disabled and can't be reversed. This setting offers the highest level of restriction.

bitfields.name: NIDEN
bitfields.description: Non Secure non-invasive debug fixed state

bitfields.name: FA_ME_CMD_EN
bitfields.description: Fault Analysis/Mass Erase Command fixed state

bitfields.name: VENDOR_USAGE
bitfields.description: Upper 16 bits of vendor usage field defined in DAP. Lower 16-bits come from customer field area.

bitfields.name: DICE_INC_NXP_CFG
bitfields.description: Include NXP area in DICE computation.

bitfields.name: DICE_CUST_CFG
bitfields.description: Include Customer factory area (including keys) in DICE computation.

values.name: HEADER
values.description: TZ-M image mode is taken from application image header

values.name: DISABLED
values.description: TZ-M disabled image, boots to non-secure mode

values.name: ENABLED
values.description: TZ-M enabled image, boots to secure mode

values.name: PRESET
values.description: TZ-M enabled image with TZ-M preset, boot to secure mode TZ-M pre-configured by data from application image header

bitfields.name: BOOT_SEED_INC_NXP_CFG
bitfields.description: Include NXP area in BOOT SEED computation

bitfields.name: BOOT_SEED_CUST_CFG
bitfields.description: Include CMPA area in BOOT SEED computation

bitfields.name: BOOT_SEED_INC_EPOCH
bitfields.description: Include security epoch area in BOOT_SEED computation.

values.name: DISABLE
values.description: Plain image (internal flash with or without CRC)

values.name: ENABLE_0
values.description: Boot signed images. (internal flash, RSA signed)

values.name: ENABLE_1
values.description: Boot signed images. (internal flash, RSA signed)

values.name: ENABLE_2
values.description: Boot signed images. (internal flash, RSA signed)

bitfields.name: ADDR0_PRG
bitfields.description: Programmable portion of the base address of region 0

bitfields.name: ADDR1_PRG
bitfields.description: Programmable portion of the base address of region 1

bitfields.name: ADDR2_PRG
bitfields.description: Programmable portion of the base address of region 2

bitfields.name: REG0_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bitfields.description: For PRINCE region0 enable checking whether all encrypted pages are erased together

bitfields.name: REG1_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bitfields.description: For PRINCE region1 enable checking whether all encrypted pages are erased together

bitfields.name: REG2_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bitfields.description: For PRINCE region2 enable checking whether all encrypted pages are erased together

values.name: NOT_TRIM
values.description: Capa Bank trimmings not valid. Default trimmings value are used

bitfields.name: XTAL_LOAD_CAP_IEC_PF_X100
bitfields.description: Load capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

bitfields.name: PCB_XIN_PARA_CAP_PF_X100
bitfields.description: PCB XIN parasitic capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

bitfields.name: PCB_XOUT_PARA_CAP_PF_X100
bitfields.description: PCB XOUT parasitic capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

values.name: NOT_TRIM
values.description: Capa Bank trimmings not valid. Default trimmings value are used

bitfields.name: XTAL_LOAD_CAP_IEC_PF_X100
bitfields.description: Load capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

bitfields.name: PCB_XIN_PARA_CAP_PF_X100
bitfields.description: PCB XIN parasitic capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

bitfields.name: PCB_XOUT_PARA_CAP_PF_X100
bitfields.description: PCB XOUT parasitic capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

registers.name: FLASH_REMAP_SIZE
registers.description: This 32-bit register contains the size of the image to remap, in bytes. The 12 LSBs are ignored, so the size granularity is 4KB.

registers.name: FLASH_REMAP_OFFSET
registers.description: This 32-bit register contains the offset by which the image is to be remapped. The 12 LSBs are ignored, so the remap granularity is 4KB.
